we todd ed
Joseph Montaldo ignorant statement of the day? Shit, just go to Trumps twitter feed and you’ll find lots right there. To assume I am a liberal based on a statement says a lot.

I said you support them. I may have been mistaken,yet the comment still stands and you obviously don't support your President.
He is your president if you are an American that's a fact. So like ppl say. Get over it.

Just like you probably assumed I'm a Trump supporter. Yet he is the president just like every man who was before him. Their politics rarely effect my life. Yet when you start calling me names etc forcing me to choose a side and telling me fuck you. Well then it makes things simple. Fuck you too. Not you personally but in general.
